title: FOR SALE: T205 Cobb - PSA 3.5 - Full bordered & Centered.
author: MattyC

posts.post_title: FOR SALE: T205 Cobb - PSA 3.5 - Full bordered & Centered.
posts.post_content:
Compares favorably to higher graded examples. Notable features are...

+ Full borders that fill the holder.

+ Great centering.

+ Great registration (many specimens have red ink shifted onto the white ball). 

Not many examples in any grade with all three of these key attributes. 

$1750 firm, shipped and insured. 

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/mattianc/the-collection/18045/1911-t205-ty-cobb[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i741.photobucket.com/albums/xx58/mattianc/11T205CobbBack007_zpsc818d012.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks for looking, fellas.

Best,

Matt
